translations: n.对自然现象的崇拜；裸体主义

sentences.sentence: Unsurprisingly, heliotherapy and naturism are popular here.
sentences.translation: 不出所料，日光疗法和自然疗法在这里很受欢迎。

sentences.sentence: The Western naturism has influence on the new period literature of China.
sentences.translation: 西方自然主义对中国新时期的文学是有影响的。

sentences.sentence: The company said it expects the cruise to appeal to a variety of European nationalities – but particularly Germans, as they are “really into naturism”.
sentences.translation: 公司希望这次航行能引起各个欧洲国家游客的兴趣，但主要还是德国人，因为德国人是“真正热爱自然的人。”
